meanings.definition: A disease of the arteries characterized by the deposition of plaques of fatty material on their inner walls.
meanings.sent1: Atherosclerosis can lead to heart problems if not treated early.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often check for atherosclerosis during routine health screenings.
meanings.sent3: The atherosclerosis in the old bridge made it unsafe for heavy trucks.
meanings.sent4: The atherosclerosis of misinformation clogged the flow of accurate data.
meanings.sent5: The atherosclerosis of neglect slowly choked the life out of the once vibrant neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The process of progressive thickening and hardening of the walls of arteries from fat deposits.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can help prevent atherosclerosis in the arteries.
meanings.sent2: Atherosclerosis can restrict blood flow and cause serious health issues.
meanings.sent3: The atherosclerosis of bureaucracy slowed down the decision-making process.
meanings.sent4: The atherosclerosis of doubt hardened his resolve to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The atherosclerosis of fear paralyzed her with indecision.
